description:
Dreaming of an Italian holiday?

The sights, sounds and tastes of Italian get you so excited that you instantly book your tickets and start planning your trip.

But wait! How's your Italian? Non existent…well…worry not!

Subscribe to Talk Italiano and soon you'll know enough basic Italian to make your vacation even more memorable.

For only $9 and in less than 3hours, you'll get a crash course which will cover everything from alphabets and pronunciations to stringing simple sentences.

What's more, this isn't your bog standard boring language course full of dozens of powerpoint slides and text. The whiteboard animations and sketches used in producing these creative videos will leave a lasting impression in your mind's eye.

It's a fact that the brain recalls images and pictures better than words. What's these multi sensory video scribes are even used by a certain B. Obama in Washington!

For learning a language, whiteboard videos are ground breaking and entertaining. This the the key to get a grasp of Italian!

SO WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR, SUBSCRIBE AND ENJOY!

BE YOUR OWN JUDGE : Try the free preview of our Lesson 13 on Shopping.
title: Talk Italiano: The basics
